mapper.select: /* SQL_id = gameNormal.cmmn.FNL1002.selectGameInfo */ SELECT MC_IDNO , MC_NAME , MC_MBID , MC_IMGLOCATION , MC_IMGNAME , MC_DEL_YN , MC_USE_YN , #{mbIdno} AS MB_IDNO FROM FNL1002 WHERE MC_MBID = #{mbIdno} AND MC_DEL_YN = 'N' AND MC_USE_YN = 'Y'

/* SQL_id = gameNormal.cmmn.FNL1002.selectGameCharaDtlInfo */ SELECT T1.MC_IDNO , T1.MC_MBID , T1.MC_NAME , T1.MC_JOBCODE , JOB_TAB.CD_NAME AS JOB_NAME , T1.MC_LEVEL , T1.MC_NOWHP , T1.MC_NOWMP , T1.MC_NOWEXP , EXP_TAB.CD_NAME AS REQ_EXP , T1.MC_STR , T1.MC_INT , T1.MC_DEX , T1.MC_CON , T1.MC_GOLD , T1.MC_IMGLOCATION , T1.MC_IMGNAME FROM FNL1002 T1 INNER JOIN FNL1006 EXP_TAB ON TO_CHAR(T1.MC_LEVEL) || 'LVEXP' = EXP_TAB.CD_CODE AND EXP_TAB.CD_BIG_CODE = 'CD0000000000004' AND EXP_TAB.CD_DEL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN FNL1006 JOB_TAB ON T1.MC_JOBCODE = JOB_TAB.CD_CODE AND JOB_TAB.CD_BIG_CODE = 'CD0000000000003' WHERE T1.MC_DEL_YN = 'N' AND T1.MC_USE_YN = 'Y' AND T1.MC_IDNO = #{mcIdno}
